Private Events / Catering
Get In Touch
We do everything from small groups to full buyouts, curated in-house experiences, catering and custom cakes made to order for your special occasion!
Our team is here to listen to all your needs and make your dreams come true. Your wish is our command!
For all inquiries, please fill out the form below and we’ll be in touch soon. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out at
lampevents@thrivinghospitalityent.com
.

Menu
Find a Table
Our Story
THE SECRET OF OUR SUCCESS
A distinctive, well-preserved and comfortable space, high-quality products, authentic cuisine, food & drinks done flawlessly.
——–
The Bar's History
Our Philosophy
At Lamp & Shade, we believe that an exceptional dining experience arises from a harmony of dedicated service, meticulous attention to detail, and a profound respect for our ingredients. Our philosophy is rooted in a commitment to excellence in every aspect of our service. Each dish and every drink we present is crafted with the highest quality ingredients, sourced responsibly and prepared with both skill and passion.
Beloved Place
Unique Experience
We take pride in creating memorable moments for our guests, curating an atmosphere where each visit becomes a unique and cherished experience. Above all, our aim is to exceed expectations, ensuring that from the moment our guests arrive to their very last sip, every detail is flawless. Here, fine dining is not just eating, it is an event—a celebration of culinary artistry and exceptional hospitality.
Make A Reservation
